website_summaries.verdict: This table offers the convenience of its plastic partners with the durability and beauty of bamboo and aluminum.
pros: Folds to a nice size that is easy to carry
Smooth bamboo top that is water resistant
This table looks great for a portable folding outdoor table
cons: While this table is sturdy, the legs are thinner than others on the market

customer_reviews.title: Great Table Indoors and Out
customer_reviews.text: I've had my eye on this table for awhile, ever since starting life on the road in my little RV. I needed a table that could fold short enough to fit under my bench seat, be sturdy enough to use inside and outside, have enough surface to eat and work AND most importantly, raise to a normal height. My biggest struggle finding a table was they were all too short! This one give you an easy-to-adjust option. The table materials are amazing, all the fittings are sturdy and metal and the table top itself is beautiful bamboo. It's easy to fold out or fold away as well. Couldn't be more satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Risa

customer_reviews.title: top warped
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this table looks. But, the bamboo top is very poorly made. I've had it for months and has been set up in a spare room in my house, the entire time I've owned it. I have used it for light duty - writing, sorting photos, etc. Yesterday I folded it to store it and discovered the top is severely warped. It still looks great other than a huge dip in the middle of the table.
customer_reviews.author: Crager

customer_reviews.title: Best option for a folding table
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend always complained about me doing puzzles on a large piece of cardboard on the floor. Doing the puzzles on the floor would kill my knees and back. Card tables are not big enough to contain a whole puzzle. This table however is perfect. I can get it out, work my puzzle in a chair with good body posture, and then easily fold it up and stow it when I am done. It has a very smooth top that you can hardly see the middle line it folds at. The adjustable height is wonderful too. It is easy to fold and easy to set up. Very sturdy and looks well made. Very good purchase and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Awhatchamacallit

customer_reviews.title: Nice table, but ....
customer_reviews.text: We just received this table and it's very nice. Sturdy and nice looking, great size, 3 heights, so very functional. I just wish it came with a carrying bag/cover like the smaller versions of the same brand table. Without some kind of protection, the bamboo is going to get banged up when packed in the back of our truck with all our other gear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A folding table fit for the living-room and the campground
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a board gaming table for the living room. The adjustable height legs mean we don’t have to bend over as far to reach the board as we had to on our old coffee table. And since it folds so easily, we can easily stow it and take it out when we want to game. Looks very nice, too, and a good solid feeling. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Doofusdan

customer_reviews.title: Attractive folding table
customer_reviews.text: I like the bamboo top of the table, as well as the fact that it has three different heights. It folds nicely and has a handle to carry it, which makes it much easier to move it to where you want to use it. It's fairly sturdy but not terribly heavy, so it's easy enough for me to handle alone. It certainly wasn't inexpensive, but I think I will get lots of years of use out of it...
customer_reviews.author: Cat Sailor

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good camp table
customer_reviews.text: We really like this table, but now that we’ve had it for awhile I have a couple of complaints. Pros: Table construction is great Easy to fold and set up or take down Adjustable legs Descent amount of workspace Cons: Our handle broke within the first month or two The finish has worn and faded — so you’ve got to maintain it regularly
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great folding table for any camping trip!
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty stoked about this table, it folds up really easily and I love the bamboo top. It raises up to the perfect height to sit at, but not quite high enough to use while standing. It's fairly heavy though, so if you were hoping for something to pack for a distance or anything like, maybe look somewhere else. This is definitely more suited to a campsite you can drive to. The top is also pretty soft (as one can expect from bamboo), it's pretty easy to scratch if you're not careful. Overall, I'm please with this table. It fit all of my needs perfectly, and I like the way it looks!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle S.

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last?
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this table and the portability but have had it for 6 weeks and the wood is starting to separate on the top layer. It looks like plywood with multiple layers but made with bamboo. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. E

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: We have had the table in use on our pontoon boat with heavy use for a month now. We could not be more please with the utility, quality and stylish looks. It adjusts to the right height for snacks or meals in a snap. Plus the compliments on its looks have been great. Solid purchase!
customer_reviews.author: J A.

customer_reviews.title: warped, split
customer_reviews.text: The table is a nice looking design, but the bamboo was warped from day one and the tabletop split within a few weeks merely sitting in storage. It was never rained on or exposed to high temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: What table am I getting?
customer_reviews.text: This was not the table I ordered. I ordered a table that folded 4 ways lengthwise. The table I received only folded 2 ways. Otherwise it is the same design. I still like it and am keeping it. They seem to have had a problem with inventory and changed the product descriptions and pictures several times. The second table they showed after the first was not available folded the in the other dimension. Glad I didn't get that one. I am using this table in an RV both inside and outside, and the lengthwise fold is important to store under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Rudd Milam

customer_reviews.title: Best table quality ever
customer_reviews.text: This table I'd very versatile height, size perfect for 2 people.. Even when you dont feel like putting in the RV table it easily fits in through the door. Fits neatly in the storage bag. Even when you have uneven ground outside you can adjust the legs to not have tipping of the table.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T Murphy

customer_reviews.title: I love this table
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this table. I needed something that was sturdy, adjustable, and could be easily stowed when necessary. Really good quality construction, doesn't feel like you're average folding table. The bamboo top has a great aesthetic and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Pickens

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tables!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these guys for a last-minute event, and they are beautiful! Great condition, easy to fold up and carry, and unfold for setup, as well! I am considering buying the larger version now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table for travel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table so my family could play games together and use it for picnics. It folds and stores nicely! I haven't taken it outdoors yet because of social distancing, but I do not anticipate any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Little

customer_reviews.title: great even for a desk
customer_reviews.text: you can use it for anything...desk..work station..dining table(indoors too)...ez to set up...very good solid product
customer_reviews.author: david sher

customer_reviews.title: Great table for the price
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't write reviews but seeing how low these reviews were got me wanting to up it. I actually use this table as a dining table and it works great! It's really nice and modular so I can fold it up when I need that extra room and make it lower so we can play table tops. I'm a huge fan!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Good table
customer_reviews.text: very nice top. Quite sturdy for a table with such scrawny legs.I am using it as a temporary project table.
customer_reviews.author: ticked off

customer_reviews.title: Art table
customer_reviews.text: I use this table as a workstation for my artwork, watercolors and drawing. It folds away nicely when I need to put up a rollaway bed for visitors. It is very stable for for my requirements and I was impressed by the quality
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Whalley

customer_reviews.title: Super versatile, a bit wobbly.
customer_reviews.text: Best: the bamboo surface is smooth and great for use. It folds up super easily, and fits under my couch. It looks classy! Worst: the legs don't really lock out, so I have to be very careful not to push the table if things are on it. Better to pick it up and move it.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Hulse

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this table for RVing. MUCH nicer than the picture would indicate. Sturdy, innovative folding design locks closed as well as open. The bamboo top is very nice and will go well with the bamboo folding chair set I have. Do not normally write reviews but this table was so much more than I expected that I wanted to say Thanks to KingCamp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews and I was skeptical that this really was that easy to put together. It is. I live in a studio in manhattan. I wanted an affordable table I didn’t have to assemble. That looks sharp. I stumbled upon this and it totally fits the bill. There are knobs on the bottom that twist to adjust height of each leg. This is useful if your floors are slightly uneven, gets rid of any wobble. It’s not unshakable but it’s a solid piece to have.
customer_reviews.author: luxe185

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: This table is great for tailgating. If you forget a tablecloth, don't worry. The bamboo top is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: LotsaHosta

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: This table is the perfect size for our camper. Its easy to open and close and store. Its, also easy to clean. Very pretty, too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sized table quick fold out setup/setdown
customer_reviews.text: Used it as a quick set up table for making s’mores by the bonfire. Easy to set up and put down. Perfect for what I was looking for and I’m sure we’ll be able to use for my husband and sons camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: PLN

customer_reviews.title: Came Chipped
customer_reviews.text: It came chipped. I was very disappointed. Wish the quality was better.
customer_reviews.author: N. Yang

customer_reviews.title: A Great Sturdy Table, Easy To Set Up
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this table. It set up easy and is a perfect size. The quality is excellent and it’s solid once set up.
customer_reviews.author: Gene R. Stull Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but over priced
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not a table for 6 people ( 6 kids yes). 4 yes, 6 no. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas S.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: For the price we paid, it’s not worth it. The tabletop is not flat and things get stuck in the crease every time we use it.
customer_reviews.author: Phira Rehm

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and folds up easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a mobile craft table. It is very sturdy, and the top is nice and smooth. It folds up easily. There are two height options, which is very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great table, sturdy and easy to set up. I especially like the adjustable legs. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Cole K

customer_reviews.title: very nice table. We use it when travling in our ...
customer_reviews.text: very nice table. We use it when travling in our Motorhome. It sets up easy when camping and it is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph J Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I was looking for to add length to my dining room table. A bit expensive but right size and height; worked well and folded up nice and tight to easily store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to fold/unfold!
customer_reviews.text: This beautiful table folds and adjusts so easily! It has a nice handle too. Also perfect size for our storage space. Now I just want a carrying case...
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Thielen

customer_reviews.title: developed a crack within 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Been in closet waiting for summer camping. First time put up in middle of May and noticed crack along grain of bamboo. Crack has grown since. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Janel Hinrichsen

customer_reviews.title: The handle sucks
customer_reviews.text: I was about to fall in love with this little bamboo table. Then about the 10th time I tried to carry it by the handle the handle broke, for no apparent reason.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great little table
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about seating for six people but the table is well made and very sturdy. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Paige

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE ON CAMPING TRIP!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awsome table you really should by it its worth the money. Very well made and beautiful craft
customer_reviews.author: Lissette Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a large crack at the fold. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Used As A Mobile Grooming Table
customer_reviews.text: I'm a house call groomer. I used this as a mobile table for grooming larger dogs up to 85lbs. I just put a non-slip mat down. It's at the right height for me. Works Great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great as a temp desk
customer_reviews.text: Currently using as a double desk for 2 kids doing virtual school and it’s working great
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R Buchler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: well built & worth the money compared to orthe tables in that price range
customer_reviews.author: Richard F.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Table!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sturdy and versatile table. Height adjust perfectly for different chairs. Very happy with selection
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Pooler

customer_reviews.title: Kind of wobbly
customer_reviews.text: The top is beautiful but the table legs felt weak, table wobbled too much for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this table. Exposure to a lot of rain turns the tabletop black.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Schlapkohl

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to your camping gear
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent camping table. It's compact, versatile and comfortable to sit at. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: cesium2001

customer_reviews.title: Warped and split NEVER got to use it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table based on the product reviews from others. The very first time I lifted to table with the plastic handle, the handle broke. Nevertheless, rather than return the table, I figured I could live without a handle. This past week I was going camping--finally my chance to use the table--alas, it was so warped that it was unusable. The glued joints had all but come apart. I'm fairly sure the dry climate here in Nevada didn't help, but this was ridiculous. $139 and never once did I get to use the table. And I'm sure it's now been too long to return it. At least I will try to contact Amazon next week.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the sturdiest camping table I've owned. Holds a lot and is very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Allen Watts

customer_reviews.title: Some quality Issues
customer_reviews.text: I think there are some quality issues with this table, the first one i bought had a faulty leg that wouldn't ever lock. The replacement has a chip where the two center pieces meet, and the two halves don't line up quite as well as the first one we received. I am keeping it because functionally this one seems good, but i expect more out of new products.
customer_reviews.author: GNL

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice BUT Cracks mysteriously appear?
customer_reviews.text: Table was nice until it began to crack out of nowhere. No one was even sitting at the table when we heard a sound and realized after searching the apt that the table itself was was cracking ? THe bamboo tabletop is literally splitting? It's least of all ODD and has barely been in the house 3 days before this odd occurrence. As USUAL, I tossed the box and packing once I inspected the item and now I cannot return the item without the packing and box? I am now stuck with this table that's cracking all over; waiting to go home and find it in pieces on the floor truthfully - VERY DISAPPOINTED - Heavy Duty ??? NOT
customer_reviews.author: Frank J. Scala

customer_reviews.title: It is a sturdy table, the bamboo top looks nice
customer_reviews.text: It is a sturdy table, the bamboo top looks nice, but I ordered two tables and one had a chip on the bamboo top. I had already thrown away the packaging so didn’t have a way to return it. For the amount of money I paid for the product, the chipped bamboo top was disappointing, but the rest of the table is nice and the 2nd piece is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great table. Easy to carry and easy to set up. We are using for beach barbecues. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: akmr

customer_reviews.title: Love the table
customer_reviews.text: Love the table, light an sturdy. Just arrived a bit damaged, The edges of the bamboo top are scratched on all edges. Looks like the quality control of the manufacturer also has some issues. one leg was mounted a bit off. Anyway I use it for our motorhome and used it already, so I just keep it as is. To much trouble to return, but for this price the quality should be better.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Beyer

customer_reviews.title: The desk/table is of great quality, easy to set up and take down ...
customer_reviews.text: The desk/table is of great quality, easy to set up and take down and provides easily customizable height. There are many locking mechanisms to make sure the table stays steady, a great plus! However, as with most tables that fold in the middle, it's a little uneven, but not too noticeable, hence the deduction of one star, but if I can, I would give it 4.5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Ko

customer_reviews.title: Well, that didn't last long!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for about 3 months, stored in the original box. We used it exactly one time and when we pulled it back out of the box, we saw the separation issue. How can a bamboo cutting board that is used daily, in and out of water and a knife being pushed into it constantly hold up for years and this bamboo table sitting in its box could not!
customer_reviews.author: Kartimel

customer_reviews.title: Tabletop warped and de-laminating
customer_reviews.text: I like the table and it's overall look and function. Unfortunately the table top arrived wrapped and slightly chipped in a few places, after a couple of uses the warping is worse and the bamboo layers have begun to crack and separate. No response from seller, unacceptable quality and customer service for a $140- table, luckily it happened within 30 days, this table is being returned.
customer_reviews.author: chadwest

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy table. Love the bamboo.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy table. I have twin 4 year olds and when we had a bunch of friends over all the kids ate at the table at the lowest setting. Works great...love the table. Might buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Scott K.

product_meta.title: KingCamp Folding Bamboo Table Aluminum Frame 3 Adjustable Heights 4 Person / 6 Person（47.2" x 27.6"）
feature_bullets: Adjustable legs, 3 different heights (18. 9 / 22. 4 / 27. 6 inches), for different height chairs
Spacious desktop area (47. 2 x 27. 6 inches), large enough for 6 people; Anti-UV water resistant bamboo desktop and aluminum frame. ; Very stable, and weights 22 lbs, and supports up to 176. 3 lbs
Open and folds in seconds; This table is like a suitcase with handle when packed, is space saving, and easy to carry everywhere; Packed size 25. 2 x 4. 1 x 28. 1 inches
Leveler feet to help you adjust the height of the table slightly; Perfect for indoor or outdoor parties, picnics or camping trips
Lifetime : We provide the best experience to all of our customers; Please feel free to let us know if you have any questions or concerns; Our tables are lifetime

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars61 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
